column2:
Thank you for playing Rise to Power!

Please understand that this is not by any means an easy mod and that it will be challenging even for experienced players. Dynasties will be wiped out and tears be spilled.

Make sure to turn §YNotification Events§! in the §YMessage Settings§! to §YPriority 2§! in order to not miss out on any important notifications and tutorials.

<3 MightNight <3
